thread.title: Bandipora: Encounter breaks out in J&K's Bandipora, 2 jawans injured
thread.title_full: Bandipora: Encounter breaks out in J&K's Bandipora, 2 jawans injured | India News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Bandipora: Encounter breaks out in J&K's Bandipora, 2 jawans injured
text:
NEW DELHI: An encounter between terrorists and security forces broke out in Kashmir 's Bandipora district early on Tuesday morning. 

Security forces launched a cordon and search operation in Hajin area of the district after receiving intelligence about the presence of terrorists in the area. 

Two army personnel were injured after the hidden terrorists opened fire on them. The security fired back at the terrorists, triggering an encounter. 

The firing was still on when last reports came in, a police officer told PTI. 

On Sunday, two jawans were martyred + and four Hizbul Mujahideen terrorists were shot down during an encounter in south Kashmir's Kulgam area + .
